edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model

Interface ModelFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RdfModelFactory

    public interface ModelFactory
    Interface used for creation of internal data models. Also some basic operations are implemented here.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Method Detail

      • getContainerIriFormAnnotationIri

        static java.lang.String getContainerIriFormAnnotationIri(java.lang.String annotationIri)
        Returns the containerIri of a given annotationIri
        Parameters:
        annotationIri - the annotation IRI to extract the container IRI from
        Returns:
        The container IRI, null if not a valid annotation IRI

        Returns:
        The RDF

      • createAnnotation

        Annotation createAnnotation(java.lang.String rawAnnotation,
                            Format format)
                     throws WapException
        Creation an annotation from the given formatted string. The annotation will use the IRI that is implicit in the string.
        Parameters:
        rawAnnotation - The serialized string of the annotation
        format - The format of the serialized string
        Returns:
        The created annotation
        Throws:
        WapException - if any error occurred

      • createAnnotation

        Annotation createAnnotation(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset dataset)
        Creates an annotation with the given data set as backend
        Parameters:
        dataset - The data set
        Returns:
        The annotation

      • createAnnotationList

        AnnotationList createAnnotationList(java.lang.String rawAnnotation,
                                    Format format)
                             throws WapException
        Create an annotation list from the given parameters. All existent annotations in the serialized string will be parsed and added to the annotation list.
        The annotations will use the IRIs that are implicit in the string.
        Parameters:
        rawAnnotation - The serialized string of the annotations
        format - The format of the serialized string
        Returns:
        The created annotationList
        Throws:
        WapException - if any error occurred

      • createContainer

        Container createContainer(java.lang.String rawContainer,
                          Format format,
                          java.lang.String newContainerIri)
                   throws WapException
        Creates a container from the given parameters. The container will use the IRI that is implicit in the string.
        Parameters:
        rawContainer - The serialized string of the container
        format - The format of the serialized string
        newContainerIri - The new IRI for Container
        Returns:
        The container
        Throws:
        WapException - if any error occurred

      • createContainer

        Container createContainer(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset dataset,
                          boolean preferMinimalContainer,
                          boolean preferIrisOnly)
        Creates a container with the given dataset as backend
        Parameters:
        dataset - The dataset with the containers data from the database.
        preferMinimalContainer - true, if the minimalContainer was requested
        preferIrisOnly - true, if only the IRIS without the body should be returned.
        Returns:
        The container created

      • createContainer

        Container createContainer(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset dataset)
        Creates a container with the given dataset as backend
        Parameters:
        dataset - The dataset
        Returns:
        The container

      • createPage

        Page createPage(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset dataset,
                java.lang.String containerIri,
                int pageNr,
                boolean preferIrisOnly,
                boolean isEmbedded,
                int annoTotalCount,
                java.lang.String modified,
                java.lang.String label)
        Creates a page with the given data set as backend
        Parameters:
        dataset - The data set
        containerIri - the IRI of the container requested
        pageNr - the pageNumber requested
        preferIrisOnly - true, if only the IRIS without the body should be returned.
        annoTotalCount - the total Count of the Annotations included
        modified - the modified data of the container
        label - the label of the container
        isEmbedded - true, if the page is created for embedding it into a container.
        Returns:
        The page

      • isValidInputFormat

        boolean isValidInputFormat(Format format)
        Checks whether a given Format is valid for usage in PUT/POST requests
        Parameters:
        format - The format to check for validity
        Returns:
        true if format can be used, false otherwise

      • convertFormat

        java.lang.String convertFormat(java.lang.String rawString,
                               Format srcFormat,
                               Format destFormat)
        Converts the format of a given annotation/container from srcFormat to destFormat
        Parameters:
        rawString - the serialized representation in the source format
        srcFormat - The source format
        destFormat - The destination format
        Returns:
        The converted string
